description: Tree number - T1 Cherry (Prunus Sp.) Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - under 0.15-0.3m Approx. Height - 4m Approx. - Crown Spread Diameter - 4m Crown Reduction - reduce by between 0.3-0.5m from all over. Remaining Size - Above less 0.3-0.5metre from all over.Tree number - T2 - Japanese Maple (Acer spp.) Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - under 0.15m Approx. Height - 3m Approx. Crown Spread Diameter - 2m  - Prune out the dead/diseased branches (client aware shape of tree will look scrappy) Remaining Size - As Above less dead/diseased branches. - No specific meterage as only Dead /diseased being removed.Tree number - G1 - Holm Oak hedging (Quercus ilex) Approx Height - 6m - Hedge Trimming - Work required- Level top at previous height (approx 0.3-0.5m) and trim both sides (clients and neighbours) Tree number - T3 - Birch (Betula pendula) Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.3-0.5m Approx. Height - 7m Approx. Crown Spread Diameter - 7m -  Crown Reduction - reduce by between 0.5-1m from height and from the sides. Remaining Size - Above less 0.5-1 metre from all over.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
